name: Loney
origin: Originally was a self-insert I made about 4-6 years ago. Over time she evolved to be a more complex character.
bio:
Just an average-looking girl, who joins fights at random because she is bored.
Her magic is quite weak, but that doesn't hold her back from trying!

Come, hang out! ^^
We can talk any time you want!
personality:
- Reserved, introverted.
- VERY apologetic. Apologizes for the smallest mistakes she makes.
- Often refers to pop culture and uses gamer and/or coding terminology.
- She finds it difficult to hide her emotions.
appearance:
- Average-looking girl.
- Long, dark hair.
- Long, baggy T-shirt that the wind can slightly blow.
- Pants > Skirts
- Quite tall, but still shorter than someone like Sophie.

abilities.name: Telekinetic Bullets
abilities.description: 6 small, circular, white bullets that deal 600 damage every 0.8 seconds in a short range.
abilities.details:
- Has an ammo count of 6 and a reload time of 2 seconds.
- 3 bullets floating above one arm, 3 above the other, swapping between the arm that shoots with every shot.

abilities.name: Charged Shot
abilities.description: Bring your hands forward, slowly charging up your bullets in front of you at a rate of 1 bullet every 1.2 seconds. You can hold these bullets indefinitely until you stop channeling, when all of these bullets are shot at once, each dealing 220 damage. The charge rate is halved while you are Out of Combat.
abilities.details: - Cannot activate another ability except Suspended Jump for the duration.

abilities.name: Suspended Jump
abilities.description: Jump Upwards a great distance, then gain 90% Air- and Gravity Control for 0.6 seconds for every ammo you have left.

abilities.name: Reflex Block
abilities.description: Bring up your bullets in front of you, blocking all incoming damage from the front and healing yourself by 30% of the negated Damage every time you do so. Blocking costs 1 Ammo.
abilities.details:
- Cannot be triggered if you have no ammo.
- Re-firing this ability will immediately cancel it.
- All instances of damage within 0.5 seconds of consuming ammo will be negated without consuming Ammo.
- Acts as a Blocking ability.

abilities.name: Social Anxiety
abilities.description: Immediately clear all current negative effects off of you, then gain 40 {{KW:Speed}}, {{KW:Stealth}} and {{KW:Ghostlike}} for 6 seconds. Using any ability other than Suspended Jump will cancel this one.
abilities.details:
- Immediately consumes 20% Ultimate Charge, the rest gets depleted during the duration.
- You may charge Charged Shot for the duration.
- Ultimate Shout: "Oops, gotta go!" (Self/Enemy) "See y'all!" (ally)

talents.name: Alone Time
talents.description: You get Out Of Combat 1.5 seconds earlier. {{ABILITY:4}} makes you {{KW:INVULNERABLE}} for 2 seconds after activated, but you cannot activate any abilities for the first 2 seconds of the ability.

talents.name: His Gift
talents.description: Hitting an enemy with a {{ABILITY:1}} made out of at least 6 bullets {{KW:Disarm|4}} that enemy for 1.5 seconds and gives you 60% increased Reload Speed for the next 3 seconds.

talents.name: Inhuman Reflexes
talents.description: Set {{ABILITY:3}}'s Base Cooldown to 7 seconds. Change {{ABILITY:3}} to: Bring up your bullets in front of you for up to 3 seconds. If you would receive any kind of Damage from the front, Negate it and shoot a hitscan shot going from your eyes to the location you are pointing to with your crosshair, dealing the amount of Damage you would have received as Damage and the amount of True Damage you would have received as True Damage. You cannot use any ability during this ability's duration. Acts as a Blocking ability. Any subsequent instances of Damage you receive from the front within 1 second of the first one is also Negated and Reflected as described above.

talents.name: Many Bullets
talents.description: Increase your maximum Ammo Count by 2 and increase your Reload Speed by 30%.

talents.name: Copycat
talents.description: Whenever you kill an enemy, copy their Ultimate. The current Ultimate Charge and the one you gain is adjusted to the new Ultimate's one. Dying clears the stolen Ultimate.
talents.details: - If you kill an enemy Loney who has a stolen Ultimate, you gain the copied Ultimate.

cards.name: Creeping Anxiety
cards.description: You have {{SCALE:15|15}} {{KW:Armor}} while you are Out of Combat and for 1 second after entering combat.

cards.name: Planning Ahead
cards.description: Reduce all of your active cooldowns by {{SCALE:0.1|0.1}} seconds every second while you are Out of Combat.

cards.name: Self-Confidence
cards.description: Getting an Elimination grants you {{SCALE:0.8|0.8}}% Ultimate Charge. This is doubled when earning a Kill.

cards.name: Despair
cards.description: Attempting to activate an ability on cooldown will reset its cooldown. This card has a cooldown of {{SCALE:120|-15}} seconds.

cards.name: Leap of Faith
cards.description: Increase {{ABILITY:2}}'s jump power by {{SCALE:7|7}}%, or by {{SCALE:10|10}}% while at or below 40% Health.

cards.name: Dashing Clouds
cards.description: Re-activating {{ABILITY:2}} while you still have its after-effects will case you to lose said effects, but you will dash forward.

cards.name: Lightweight
cards.description: Increase the duration of {{ABILITY:2}}'s after-effects by {{SCALE:6|6}}%.

cards.name: Pursuit
cards.description: Gain {{SCALE:8|8}} {{KW:Speed}} for 3 seconds when you land after using {{ABILITY:2}}.

cards.name: Party Breaker
cards.description: Damaging enemies with a {{ABILITY:1}} made of at least 4 bullets makes them receive {{SCALE:10|10}}% less healing for 3 seconds.

cards.name: Jabber
cards.description: Reduce {{ABILITY:1}}'s base charge-up time by {{SCALE:0.1|0.1}} seconds per bullet.

cards.name: Self Defense
cards.description: {{ABILITY:1}} deals 30% increased Damage when you hit an enemy with it that damaged you in the last 3 seconds. You take 50 Damage per bullet charged if you hit an enemy that didn't.

cards.name: Holding Out
cards.description: Reduce the cooldown of {{ABILITY:3}} by {{SCALE:10|10}}% if you block a shot.

cards.name: Wounds Retaliated
cards.description: Gain {{SCALE:10|10}}% {{KW:Lifesteal}} for 3 seconds after blocking a shot with {{ABILITY:3}}. Does not stack.
